android.text.style
接口 UpdateLayout

所有超级接口：
UpdateAppearance
所有已知实现类：
AbsoluteSizeSpan, DynamicDrawableSpan, ImageSpan, MetricAffectingSpan, RelativeSizeSpan, ReplacementSpan, ScaleXSpan, StyleSpan, SubscriptSpan, SuperscriptSpan, TextAppearanceSpan, TypefaceSpan
public interface UpdateLayout
extends UpdateAppearance

The classes that affect character-level text formatting in a way that triggers a text layout update when one is added or removed must implement this interface. This interface also includes UpdateAppearance since such a change implicitly also impacts the appearance.
